moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 e: This move is not the usual move played in this variation of the Sicilian defence. Usual is 8...B5, 9 Bxf6 gxf6 10 Nd5 whereby white obtains a small advantage. This is anyway not a bad move tough.
moves.9. Nc4 h5: H5?  is a mistake. This weakens the kings side dramatically making 0-0 almost impossible to play since bxf6 should be met by gxf6
moves.10. Bxf6 gxf6 11. Nd5 Bxd5 12. exd5 Ne7: A4! is a strong move as this shows immediately the weakened position of black. Because of h5, 0-0 is impossible and so to bring the king in safety 0-0-0 should be played but that has a weak point which is the field b6! with a4 white immediately attacks to obtain b6. Black has a problem as 0-0-0 is risky.
moves.13... Qc7 14. a5 O-O-O 15. Ra4: nice move but also Nb6 first was possible
moves.15... Kb8 16. Nb6 Qc5 17. c3 Nc8: So this is not so good. On the other hand black has problems to develop the pieces. In nay way white already obtained a big advantage. This move just makes it worse and thats because of the next move
moves.18. Bxa6: Bxa6!! a striking and winning piece sacrifice. Black is lost!!!
moves.18... Nxb6: Also bxa6 does not help because of RC4 Qxa5 Nxc8 (RXC8 Qb3)
moves.19. axb6 bxa6 20. Rxa6 Rc8: only move because of otherwise Ra8+!
moves.21. O-O Qb5 22. Qa1 Kb7 23. Ra7+ Kxb6 24: (Kc7 Rxb7+ Qxb7 Rc1+ and mate soon
